title: Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells for jobs in India
selftext: The losses for India may have mounted to ₹11.5 trillion in seven years.
comments:
1st headline: "Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells in Modi government!"

Editor: "Not true"

2nd headline: "Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells in corporate India"

Editor: "You gotta be joking!"

3rd headline: "Ok..umm...Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells among economists?"

Editor: "Nuh uh"

4th headline: "Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells among Indians?"

Editor: "Haha that was a good one that was"

5th headline: "How abt...Shrinking informal economy rings alarm bells for jobs in India?"

Editor: "That's the one!"
